title: I did not get any essences
body: I had 14 rune page and a lot of rune and I'm just at 4000 essences, Just like yesterday.

replies.body: Did you make sure to play a matchmade game to complete the mission that starts the conversions? After that you'll need to open the orbs the missions gives you to get all of your BE

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=x9iEEVKR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-09T01:25:42.966+0000)
>
> Did you make sure to play a matchmade game to complete the mission that starts the conversions? After that you'll need to open the orbs the missions gives you to get all of your BE

Thanks, it worked.
